description: Trinidad and Tobago: Climate Change Enabling Activity.  Self-assessment for preparation of a project proposal for Trinidad and Tobago's Second National Communication to the UNFCCC.

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
Production of the Second National Communication to the UNFCCC  which will include Section on National Circumstances, National Greenhouse Gas Inventory, Programme containing measures to mitigate CC, Programmes containing measures to facilitate adequate adaptation to climate change. The project through a stocktaking exercise will follow up on the activities of the Initial National Communication (INC) and will serve as the basisfor identifying gaps and allow for the selection of priority areas for the Second National Communication. The areas of focus are:
1) The preparation of a greenhouse gas inventory for the year 2000.
2) An update on the activities related to vulnerability studies and adaptation assessments.
3) Training, research and capacity building.
subproject.title: 2ND National Comm. to UNFCCC
